data.title: April 27, 1947, What happened that day?
data.meta_description: Discover what the world looked like on Sunday, April 27, 1947 on Takemeback.to. Which News were making the headlines? Which were the top Hits and the most popular Movies?
data.text:
April 27, 1947 was a Sunday and it was the 117th day of the year 1947 in the Gregorian calendar.

April 27, 1947 can also be written as 4/27/1947 in the US and as 27/4/1947 in UK and Europe.

The Zodiac and Astrological sign for April 27th is Taurus.

Taurus is the 2nd sign in the Western Zodiac. People born between April 20th and May 20th belong to the Taurus sign: discover Taurus personality and who should a Taurus marry.

Babies born in April are either Aries or Taurus. People born before April 19th are Aries, while people born from April 20th have the sign of Taurus.

Discover the personality of April born.

April 27, 1947: What is the Chinese Zodiac Sign for that day?

The Chinese Zodiac sign for April 27, 1947 is Pig and the associated element is Fire.

Discover the Pig personality and how the Fire Element might affect a person's traits and compatibility with other signs according to the Chinese zodiac.

Moon phase

The moon phase on April 27, 1947 was Waxing crescent.

The moon phase refers to the appearance of the Moon in the night sky on April 27, 1947 and is determined by the portion of the Moon's illuminated surface that is visible from Earth.

An observer located in New York City on April 27, 1947 at 10pm, would see the moon, being 54% full, rising at 11:32 am and setting at 02:57 am.

The previous full moon was on Apr 05, 1947 while the next full moon would come on May 05, 1947.

How many days until your next birthday if you were born on April 27, 1947?

There are 260 days until your next birthday, which will occur on Sunday April 27th 2025.

You belong to the Baby Boomer Generation if you were born on April 27, 1947.

What is special about April 27th?

April 27th refers to a specific date on the calendar, which is the 27th day of the month of April. It is a date that occurs annually and is part of the Gregorian calendar, which is widely used around the world.

Over the years several events happened on April 27th, such as:

2019 - Official video for taylor swift's song "me!" the official video for taylor swift's "me" premiered thursday night. it broke vevo's record of the largest debut with at least 56.9 million views in 24 hours.

2018 - As protests enter their fifth week, the united nations high commissioner zeid ra'ad al hussein requests israel to stop using lethal force. israeli defence forces are openly firing again, even using live ammunition.

2017 - Syrian civil war: the syrian observatory for human rights reported a large explosion close to damascus international airport, followed by a fire. according to the syrian government, israel attacked the military base with multiple missiles. yisrael katz, israeli intelligence minister, stated that the strike was in complete agreement with israel's policies. (bbc) (wires via sydney morning herald: israeli air defense command shot down a syrian air force drone with a mim-104 patriot missile.
